name: Twin Mind: Nobody's Here - Collector's Edition
description: Science has never been more dangerous! Death is in the air... Sounds pretty ominous, doesn't it? Help the twin detectives solve a new case!

name: Pichi Girl
description: Pichi Girl is an addicting game in which you have to solve puzzles with Lovely Girls.The game is perfect for relaxing.

name: Tsubaki Hata
description: Tsubaki Hata is an addicting game in which you have to solve puzzles with Lovely Girls.The game is perfect for relaxing.

name: Relaxing Lawnmower Simulator
description: Sit back and relax while calmly mowing grass in a wide field near the ocean. Or, if you want a challenge, try to mow the residents lawn before they get annoyed at you...

name: LEGO Star Wars: The Skywalker Saga - Andor Character Pack
description:
Fight against the evil Galactic Empire and play as resistance fighters from Star Wars: Rebels, LEGO style.

Characters Include:

Sabine Wren
Ezra Bridger
Admiral Thrawn
Kanan Jarrus
Hera Syndulla

name: LEGO Star Wars: The Skywalker Saga - Book of Boba Fett Character Pack
description:
Travel beyond Tatooine and through the galaxy as bounty hunters and mercenaries from The Book of Boba Fett, LEGO style.

Characters Include:

Cad Bane
Krrsantan
The Armorer
Cobb Vanth
Peli Motto

name: Survive Till Morning
description: “Survive Till Morning” is a first person Dark fantasy horror - created by one person. The focus of the game is the story and its atmosphere, also the game is filled with: puzzles, achievements, references, different endings and gameplay styles (no shooting system). The approximate duration of the game - two hours.

name: Azazel's Christmas Fable
description: A wacky 8-bit retro-style point and click Christmas adventure, reminiscent of '90s classics. Explore Santa's village as a devilish imp with a mischievous knack for getting into trouble. Solve puzzles and uncover mysteries while meeting some peculiar characters along the way.

name: Need for Speed Unbound: Palace Edition
description:
Need for Speed Unbound Palace Edition and get 3 days early access plus exclusive Palace branded content including:
- 4 stunningly intense new Custom Cars
- Palace Clothing Pack containing 20 items
- Palace Driving Effects
- Loads more bitz

name: Need for Speed: Unbound
description: Race against time, outsmart the cops, and take on weekly qualifiers to reach The Grand, Lakeshore's ultimate street racing challenge. Pack your garage with precision-tuned, custom rides and light up the streets with your style, exclusive fits, and a vibrant global soundtrack that bumps in every corner of the world.

name: Assassin's Creed Valhalla: The Last Chapter
description:
The Last Chapter is a free update for Assassin's Creed: Valhalla and is the final part of Eivor Varinsdottir's story.

While it was originally planned to release with Update 1.6.2 on 6 December 2022, an unforeseen scheduling error made it release a week early on 29 November instead.

name: Operation: Forge the Deep
description: Solve real materials science problems, contribute to science, and survive a new ice age in a puzzle adventure that combines engineering problems with a unique puzzle that will challenge how you look at the world around you.

name: Soccer Story
description:
It's been a year since The Calamity tore apart the very foundations of soccer as we know it, and since then, Soccer Inc. has made dang well sure that not a soul has been allowed to even look at a soccer ball, let alone kick it.

Soccer may have been banned across the world... but now there is hope! A magical soccer ball has chosen you, our Savior of Soccer! Soccer Story is a physics-driven adventure RPG, where every problem can be solved with your trusty magic ball.

name: Moth Lake
description: Moth Lake is a story-driven adventure game. It's a horror/comedy experience, with a lot of textual contents (more than 20k words), and hundreds of different scenes (more than 300 scenarios). Main aspects: dialogs, story structure, puzzle solving, exploration, player choices, stealth action.

name: Deepening Fire
description: Deepening Fire is a soulslike horizontal scroll action single-player game. You'll take a solo adventure in the Rhost Kingdom to challenge the powerful enemies, choose a variety of weapons, put on strong armor, and defeat the most terrifying enemies with precise blocking. Explore hidden levels, collect story pieces, and reveal ancient secrets of the Rhost Kingdom.

name: The Knight Witch
description: The Knight Witch is a metroidvania adventure game with fast-paced, shoot 'em up combat set in a beautifully hand-drawn world. Cast devastating card-based spells, forge close bonds, and make moral choices all in your quest to save your home and discover who's behind the War Golem invasion.

name: Clone Hero
description: Clone Hero is a free rhythm game, which can be played with any 5 or 6 button Guitars, Drums (knockoffs, MiDis and from official guitar hero or rock band series), Gamepad Controllers, or just your standard computer keyboard. Download the game, copy your song charts into the song folder and enjoy hours of fun!

name: Third Iteration
description: Medium sized blue runic / metal themed map remix based on rd1m2 from Runner's Delight, built on Progs Dump 3

name: Corecraft
description:
Corecraft is a innovative reinvention of the classical Shoot ‘Em Up Games. Fully physically simulated and sophisticated modular spacecrafts (Corecrafts). Every Level plays differently and has an evil endboss waiting for you at the end!

Build your own Corecraft (modular spacecraft) and blow you enemies in pieces! Find the best tactic to annihilate Corecrafts, made of up to hundrets of modules!

You decide if you want to build a small, agile but fragile fighter or a heavy tank. The possibilities are endless...

name: Atonement
description:
A collection of 33 new levels for Doom II, ranging from sprawling shootouts to claustrophobic challenge maps.

Designed for both single player and cooperative modes.

There's one brand new enemy, and a new final boss, but otherwise the gameplay is just like Classic Doom.

name: 60FPS Kitten
description:
60FPS Kitten is a difficult patience-action game where you're a kitten that moves at 60FPS!

How far can you get before you give up in despair?

name: Golf With Your Friends: Pizza Party Pack
description: Grab a slice and become the life of the party with the new Golf With Your Friends Pizza Party Pack DLC. Put your drinks hat on and get the boombox playing with this brand new set of cosmetics, including stickers, hats, trails and floaties.

name: Metal Detecting Simulator
description: 2D platformer with a view from the top. In the game you have to buy equipment to search for various items. Metal detectors, shovels, will help you in this. You come to the new land, you need to buy land and start searching for gold and coins, as well you will come across junk.

name: Castlevania: Specter of Sorrow
description: Specter Knight is now in Dawn of Sorrow! Start a game in Specter Mode to slice and dice your way through the castle using Specter Knight’s diagonal slash while engaging in mini-platforming challenges! Many rooms are tweaked for Specter Knight’s movement and there’s little secrets all around the place to allow for 100% map completion.

name: MidCreati
description: MidCreati is a platformer game where a girl must escape by creating platforms, as she is captured by an evil organization who wishes to research her mysterious powers.

name: My Secret Spy Lovers
description: Don your spy gear and investigate the murder of one of cinema's favorite stars!

name: Extreme Snowboard
description:
Ride your snowboard at high speed down the slopes of the best ski resorts in Europe and America. Set the fastest times solo, or against a friend/family in the super fun multiplayer mode.

You will be able to perform numerous tricks with the help of obstacles on the slope. Each trick you perform will give you time bonuses that will improve your final time.

name: Mermaidio 2
description: Mermaidio is relaxing 2D runner. Swim through the dangerous underwater world. Avoid or defeat enemies and collect lots of points! Watch out for sharks!

name: Ghost Guy
description: A short survival adventure game where you play as a ghost exploring an abandoned mansion. There are 11 unique endings to find.

name: Math Ball
description: "Math Ball" - a game where you can relax and hone your math skills by solving challenging problems on the go, dodging wrong decisions, and running out of time!

name: Primal Age
description: "Primal Age" is a 2D top-down battle royale game. The player must dodge enemy attacks, collect meat from enemies and be able to collect more food before the end of each round. The level is constantly getting smaller, so only one will survive!

name: Native Problems
description: "Native Problems" is a 2D top down game about an Indian who beats the souls in the form of skulls towards the evil spirits that are chasing the player. With every new level, evil spirits become stronger and angrier, and you need to have time to save ladies and stay alive.

name: Iblis2: Sorcery
description: Demon sorcery2 is a first-person psychological horror game. The events, the voiceovers are scary and completely real. Explore a mysterious village with ever-changing passwords in an atmospheric world and enjoy the terrifying joy of horror. Don't forget.. the demon is a production based on realism.

name: Mind Corridors: Paroniria
description: A fever-dream-like singleplayer puzzle horror game. Descend to the depths of a sleeping curse, survive every floor and find your way out of the never ending nightmare.

name: Computer Cats
description: Computer Cats is a 2D puzzle, you have to overcome many obstacles, on the way to the exit from the computer space

name: Car Parking Madness School Drive Mechanic Car Games Simulator 2023
description: What is the most difficult element in driving a car? parking? you are absolutely right. In game you will be able to improve your parking skill. In the game you will be able to find many parking options with varying degrees of difficulty.

name: Cruise Control Mode On!
description: This is about adrenaline.

name: Perfect Grind
description: Flip, grind and more with brand new touch controls that make it easy and fun to learn new tricks! A wide variety of cool, wacky characters and apparel to choose from! Build your own one-of-a-kind creations from over 50 different prefabs, and then share them with your friends - or the world!

name: World of Warcraft: Dragonflight
description:
The dragonflights of Azeroth have returned, called upon to defend their ancestral home, the Dragon Isles. Surging with elemental magic and the life energies of Azeroth, the Isles are awakening once more, and it's up to you to explore their primordial wonder and discover long-forgotten secrets.
Master the art of Dragonriding, with a new form of aerial movement, venture into the ancient prison of the Primal Incarnates before their malevolent power can be unleashed against the Dragon Aspects in the new raid.
Fight to reclaim Neltharus, stronghold of the black dragonflight, explore previously unknown chambers of Uldaman, defend the Life Pools of the red dragonflight, and more! In new dungeons!

name: Hologram
description: Hologram is a third-person shooter that takes place in the middle of the war of realities. In a world beyond the future, transformed by deception and illusion, evolve and overcome rapidly changing battlefields with time manipulation abilities.

name: Elevenses: The Flask
description: A mystery romance visual novel about newly married couple Jiwon and Somang who one day meet the devil, "Mephie".

name: Pillow Talk at the End of All Things.
description:
A calm and quiet night in Rio de Janeiro.

That is until you hear a shot. And another. And yet another one. The timing gets faster, with more shots, shots with different sounds. You wake up and realize something is happening in the favela nearby. Either gang violence or state violence, you never really know.

That's the same situation where Lenon finds herself for the first time, and now it's up for her "friend" Graves to help her not to panic. It's just another night in Rio, and you know things will move on as always after that.

Pillow Talk at the end of all things is a small yuri visual novel about trying to get calm during a time when violence is commonplace, and expected. Follow Lenon and Graves during what is just another night in the Cidade Maravilhosa.

name: Wordchain
description: Wordchain is a daily word game where players are given a starting letter and a scrambled set of additional letters. Players must use those letters to form a word from the starting letter. The last letter of that word becomes the first letter of the next word to be made.

name: Super Magic Elemage
description: Super Magic Elemage is a previously lost and unfinished Gameboy game, now restored and playable on PC.

name: Project: Summer Ice - Bowling: Story Six - Jane Version
description: A game in the "Project: Summer Ice Sports" series!

name: Europe Geography
description:
How good are you in geography? Do you know all the countries of Europe and their capitals? And how about English counties, German states or French regions? Can you list 10 longest European rivers? Do you know the highest mountain of Apennines? Are you able to recognize Barcelona, Amsterdam or Prague by photo?

Meet the most comprehensive game about the geography of Europe. With Europe Geography - Quiz Game you can learn in the easy and entertaining way everything about European geography: all the countries and their capitals, major cities and administrative divisions, mountains and mountain ranges, islands and archipelagos, rivers, lakes, seas and other water bodies. Europe Geography - Quiz Game is a real discovery for fans of vexillology - in the game you can find flags and coats of arms of states, regions, major cities and outside territories. Furthermore, in our application, you can find basic physical characteristics of natural objects as well as some statistical data, such as population, area size, population density, GDP and many others.

name: Rosetta
description:
Rosetta is the most beautiful woman you have ever encountered, she's a mask made of the softest rubber, with silk hair. You will chat with her, alone, in the basement, only the two of you, get to know her.

Rosetta is only 15 minutes long and contains graphic images and explicit language.

name: Reckless Auto Racing 2
description: Race like never before in this medieval style world. You are a miniaturized version of yourself. You will be racing in a world where everything will seem too big. So pay attention to the environment and your enemies. Finish the race first and become the winner.

name: Lala Hentai
description: Great relaxing hentai style puzzle game. Cute and beautiful anime girls for every taste. Great musical accompaniment and juicy drawings ‍♀️

name: The Jumping Tofu: Turbo
description: Join BIG T on his exciting journey through the kitchen and make him jump! Enjoy the colorful comic graphics accompanied by atmospheric music.

name: Singularity Runner
description: How good a runner are you? Compete against other players in the ranking of the best runners.

name: Flora Learns to Sing!
description:
The wind blowed all of the petals of Flora, a wandering flower, and they ended up in Meatos's Swamp!

Meatos is a music instructor plant, and seems very nice! He says he will teach her to sing well so the petals can return... What could go wrong?

WARNING: This game contains disturbing images and is not meant to be played by children.

name: Tanuki Tales
description:
Oh no! The nut-collecting tanuki is far away from home and a dangerously curious girl has taken an interest!

Take part in a magical and whimsical adventure as you help the tanuki return home through 3 seperate worlds containing several obstacles and enemies hindering your path!

name: Piki 2
description: A Pikmin 2 romhack with new areas and caves, and remixed treasures and enemies. Made by Antopikmin

name: Breathe
description:
Birds singing, trees swaying in the wind, the warmth of the sun in your skin. Just stop, and... breathe.

Created for A Game By Its Cover 2022 based on nbmach1ne's Famicase. Also submitted to Bird Jam and Mushroom Jam.

name: Fallen Leaves
description: This wad features 7 small to medium sized maps with mainly an autumn theme, with the last two maps being snow themed. This wad utilizes, and was largely inspired by, DiR's beautiful Opal Palette.

name: Squitter's Spider Quest
description:
Every level is now played with Squitter!

Levels have had their objects rearranged to make sure Squitter can get through them safely.

name: Bondee's Barnyard: Safety Violation
description:
The year is 2004, from inside the cow animatronic, Kou, you must defend yourself from a barrage of haywired animatronic characters.

And if that wasn't enough, you must avoid the camera systems sightline to not awake any suspicion with the security guard. If you're seen moving around, shuting doors, the guard will give Kou a remote electric shock, killing the child in the process...

The game is split into "hours" instead of the regular "nights" becasue why would you wanna stay?

With hand drawn minigames and 2 unlockable modes, you wont be starving for content at Bondee's barnyard!

name: Don't Give Up the Cat
description:
Tonight, you are out in the woods. As a cat.

A short game intended to be played at night, using headphones. In this first-person game you use your mouse to look around and scratch things, and WASD keys for walking, shift to run, and you use Esc to show the menu.

After you run you may sit around to breathe a bit and listen to the forest. Don't forget to explore around. But you may not be alone...

name: Monotonia: EXP_01
description: Monotonia: EXP_01 is the first game from Game Design Hub Studio, created for the One Button Game Jam in 7 days, played with just one button, taking on gamification on Fordism work model. Tired? Catch an ad in exchange of some of your work hours and get PAID FOR IT!

name: Stuff'd
description:
Today is Grandma’s funeral. Your brother David stopped by her house after work to pick up Grandpa but no one has heard from them. That’s when you come in..

Welcome to Stuff'd.

name: SuperBolt
description:
The little robot Bolt is on an adventure to save the princess Wrench from an evil bot!
Win against challanging enemies and levels!

Use the PowerUps to blast your way through walls and bots alike and Unleash the Power of the 4 bumpers to defeat the evil 404!

name: Queen of Minecarts
description: A Playdate game about making sure Minecarts get to where they're going.

name: Cuana
description: You don't have to be born a superhero. Play and see how the ordinary beans from the grocery changed the life of a typical youngster.

name: Quiz Thiz USA: Bronze Edition
description: Are you the new quiz master and can you beat your friends on this quiz? Answer questions about this country and collect valuable points! Also, learn new facts about this country while playing!

name: RE Encryption
description: A multi-moded adventure/rpg/topdown/puzzler/platformer game which follows a story while testing your skills in multiple ways. This game varies from timing to strategy and to general skill. RE Encryption is a short experience.

name: Hentai Nurse
description: Hentai Nurse is a relaxing puzzle game. With the theme of nurse and 24 unique sexy girls Enjoy sexy girls pictures and relaxing music to complete the puzzle.

name: Sex Adventures: Cuckold Gym
description: An explicit erotic visual novel following the story of a personal trainer becoming a cuckold for his very sexy client and her overbearing boyfriend, who decided to drop by unexpected at the gym.

name: Zankinzoken
description: We are trying to complete the tasks given to us with our robot. While completing our missions, we need to destroy many enemies and bosses. 3 different weapons we have and using different strategies, we can destroy the enemies.

name: The Qin Empire
description: Set in the most dramatic era in Chinese history! Let's conquer the world like the first emperor by making full use of strategy and wisdom! This is the war that leads to the First Emperor!

name: AdvLite
description: AdvLite - Side-Scroller Platformer, procedural generation creates unique worlds and every run is a special gaming experience.

name: Sacred Ember
description: Sacred Ember is currently a simple PvP fighter jet dogfighting game with realistic flight physics. The game aims to expand into an open-world fantasy military action-RPG.

name: Blind
description: 「Sometimes what the eye can't tell, the heart can.」 《Blind》 is a light fantasy game for girls set in a modern city. After a childhood accident that left me with a strange face blindness, I was introduced to a profession called "watchman" and since then, the world has taken on a whole new dimension.

name: Domino Dreams
description:
Welcome to Domino Dreams!
Play this fun domino royal game created for Solitaire and Domino lovers.
Discover a new realm in the most captivating and innovative board game experience on the planet!

Embark on a grand royal journey filled with fun and excitement, offering thousands of amazing levels for All Fives dominoes, Draw dominoes, and Block dominoes enthusiasts.

name: Future Cat Sailor
description: Play as the intrepid Future Cat, on a quest for wealth with which to feed his family. Boat and Platform around the haunting ruins of civilizations past. But will he be able to escape with his life!?!?!

name: SpongeBob SolitairePants
description: SpongeBob has discovered solitaire and he can’t wait to share it with you and every citizen of Bikini Bottom. SolitairePants is played across a square play area.

name: Pikmin 2 Power-Cut
description: A Pikmin 2 mod where you get to recover the energy owed by the president's wife.

name: Projeto: Átomo
description: In Projeto: Átomo, a thrilling shoot'em up/bullet hell game, you command the Alefuzo team's spaceship racing to escape Mars after a disastrous expedition.

name: Merge Survival: Wasteland
description: Hello. My name is Eden and ever since "that day", I have become alone and been living a wandering life. Due to many people's selfishness, our environment has been destroyed and became a difficult world to live in. Living alone in this world full of chaos is very exhausting and lonely. Can I possibly survive in a place like this...? Hey, you there! I think you can help me out! Could you please help me out so I can stay safe and survive in this world of misery? This is a story of people surviving in the post-apocalypse world created by environmental pollution and disasters. Merge to create survival materials, and find any new resources or hidden locations by exploring.

name: The House
description: You are invited by your friend Ashley to spend the weekend at a house away from the city.

name: Run to Infinity: Impossible Mode
description:
Run To Infinity is a so-called endless runner, where you have to get as far as possible while collecting as many coins as possible. How far can you make it?
In Toth Games' second series of games, it's all about getting as far as possible. This series of games will again be published in German, English and Swiss German.
Have fun running!

name: Run to Infinity: Hard Mode
description:
Run To Infinity is a so-called endless runner, where you have to get as far as possible while collecting as many coins as possible. How far can you make it?
In Toth Games' second series of games, it's all about getting as far as possible. This series of games will again be published in German, English and Swiss German.
Have fun running!

name: Run to Infinity: Easy Mode
description:
Run To Infinity is a so-called endless runner, where you have to get as far as possible while collecting as many coins as possible. How far can you make it?
In Toth Games' second series of games, it's all about getting as far as possible. This series of games will again be published in German, English and Swiss German.
Have fun running!

name: Maid for Loving You
description: Average guy Yuuma suddenly finds his boring life becoming way more exciting when he encounters a mysterious woman named Eve. Join him as he discovers the joys of having a live-in maid in this heartwarming visual novel.

name: Under Observation
description: You are a researcher working at a Bioweapons R&D company, focusing on national security. The weapons being developed here are usually horrifying beasts that possess many different perks. In your case, one of them has escaped and it's up to you to continue your research or escape the facility.

name: Pair of Stamps
description: This fun find-a-pair puzzle game will help improve your attention and memory, making you smile and sometimes think, both the kid and the bearded guy.

name: Springblades
description: Springblades is an action RPG where you battle your way through a fantasy island filled with funny characters.  Time your attacks and dodge enemy blows in exhilarating battles. Fight beehives, dragons and ordinary peasants on your epic quest to find 3 mysterious gems . . .

name: Luxury Garden Bundle
description:
House Flipper is a unique chance to become a one-man renovation crew. Buy, repair, and remodel devastated houses. Give them a second life and sell them with profit!

Have you ever thought of becoming a gardener? Thanks to Garden Flipper DLC it is now possible!
Before you'll start planting trees and plans you'll need to get rid of trash and rubble.
Mow the lawn, hew unwanted trees, tear out weeds and prepare your garden for a complete makeover!
Map paths out, plant new trees and bushes and set flowerbeds.

Explore completely new orders and discover innovative mechanics, which we've designed in association with professional gardeners!
Step by step, sink in the world of plants. Transform desolated gardens into beautiful masterworks - let them shine under your management.
And when you'll be ready to create your own garden...

name: Robolifter
description: Robolifter is a sci-fi sokibanish puzzle game where you level by level repair the spaceship. You are the last working Lifter bot and the last hope of your companion - Repair AI. Help her to fix the damage and investigate what caused the critical shutdown.

name: Unicorn Fun
description: Unicorn Fun is a retro rhythm game that lets the user complete a level with the controller buttons. Try to complete the level with your best time. Trophies are collected as you complete the rhythm goals. Single player fun and arcade style entertainment.

name: Run to Infinity
description:
Run To Infinity is a so-called endless runner, where you have to get as far as possible while collecting as many coins as possible. How far can you make it?
In Toth Games' second series of games, it's all about getting as far as possible. This series of games will again be published in German, English and Swiss German.
Have fun running!

name: Dino Force
description: A horizontal shoot 'em up that was previously unreleased.

name: Coloring Pixels: Advent 4 Pack
description: This Advent 4 themed book unlocks 24 additional levels for Coloring Pixels! It's time to celebrate the holiday season again!Play during the month of December to get the full Advent experience! 1 image will unlock every day between the 1st and the 24th like a true advent calendar!

name: Inheritance: Ladeina's Path
description: An adult action adventure with exploration and a rich story.

name: Jump the Gun
description: Think you can make it out? Many have tried… All have failed. Traverse the unforgiving cave and do impossible jumps with your rocket launcher and shotgun.

name: Fallen Stars
description: Fallen Stars is the story of a astronaut called Thomas Jackson who travel to I.C.E.S 1 space station to perform several duties along side with his crewmates. They worked together to perform several duties on the space station. During their journey back earth, unexpected things happen to them.

name: Boots Quest DX
description: An offbeat adventure game about traveling to the ends of the earth in search of the Best Boots. Solve puzzles, complete quests, collect items, and don weird hats as a hapless young boot enthusiast in a compact open world full of strange friends and foes. You can even jump.

name: Digital Frida
description: Digital Frida is a roguelike arena game in stylized 2D graphics.Welcome to the online virtual reality server "Digital Frida", where you can become whoever you want, do whatever you want and be wherever you want!

name: The Swarm
description: The Swamr is an abyssal boss rush. Defeat your enemy, upgrade your skills, start over.

name: Parents vs. Kids
description: Parents Vs Kids is a family game with a cartoon design that will spice up your daily life at home! The dishes to do, the dog to walk, the rooms to tidy up... Always chores, but no one to do them... Parents VS Kids is THE game that will decide for you who…

name: Bleak Dystopia
description: Bleak Dystopia is a first-person episodic, cinematic adventure, where you witness a dystopian society and explore the tragic life story of such society’s denizens.

name: Rod Multiplayer Car Driving
description: Get ready for an immersive car racing game with rod multiplayer car driving. Damage your opponents in multiplayer mode with rockets.

name: The Jumping Tofu
description: Join BIG T on his exciting journey through the kitchen and make him jump! Enjoy the colorful comic graphics accompanied by atmospheric music.

name: KnifeBoy: Rebooted
description: Things are going to start getting weird.

name: Pocket Pool
description:
It's time for crazy Pool. Sit back and enjoy 50 unique tables.
Fancy multiplayer with your friends? We have it - up to 4 players on one console!
The plan is simple: aim a cue ball, hit other balls and put them in a pocket. Here's the tricky part: the pool is a banana! Or a watermelon, or a castle, a pirate ship... you name it, we got it.

Enjoy this bonkers game, alone or with your frienemies.

name: Furry Tangram Lite
description: In Furry Tangram Lite, you’ll solve tangram puzzles while enjoying beautiful art. To clear a level you need to place all the available pieces on the given pattern. But they can't overlap! Explore a 3D hallway, and build your gallery with images from the tangram puzzles. Experience the timeless joy of 65 different tangram puzzles.

name: Cyber Dungeon: Excalibur
description: Cyber Dungeon: Excalibur, brings fun and an action-adventure experience with frantic combat, hail of bullets and robots. Can you stay alive until the end?

name: Valkie 64
description: Valkie 64 is an action adventure inspired by action adventure games from the Nintendo 64 era.

name: Temple Trashers
description: A couch co-op tower defense game, in which the towers you build can hurt you and your friends just as much as they can hurt your enemies. Build towers, aim them towards your foes and collect the crystals that drop in order to build more turrets and survive the endless hordes of enemies!

name: Summer Crush
description: Summer Crush is a visual novel for adults where the plot develops from the decisions you make. Play as a young man who has already planned out his boring adult life, and is now waiting for summer to end. What could possibly go wrong?

name: Tivick'ing! Chronicles
description: Tivick'ing! Chronicles is a fantasy RPG set on the continent of Arcadia. Play as the prince of a kingdom as he tries to unravel the mystery of the dark disturbances appearing across the continent, and their possible connection to his missing sister.

name: Moto Pizza Courier
description: “Hello, I would like to buy 2 large pizzas with extra cheese.” Does that sound familiar? Now, imagine that you receive calls like this.

name: Furry Hentai Tangram
description: Enjoy a light challenge with beautiful visuals on this relaxing puzzle game full of cute furry girls!

name: Reasoning of Courage
description: Boy, courage unravels the mysteries of everyday life It is a short detective novel game.

name: Galactoids: Galactic Invaders
description: Battle swarms of Galactic Invaders in this action-packed retro-inspired arcade shoot em up. May the Nerd be with you.

name: Mini Arenas
description: Mini Arenas is a fast-paced PVP arena shooter in which you and your friends can play and fight together. Play on a variety of stages and choose to play as one of four classes as you fight to be the last player alive!

name: Streamonaire
description: Streamonaire is a "Who Want's to Be a Millionaire" Style web based game, made specifically for streamers.

name: Cat Dimension
description: Cat Dimension is an action-packed 2D side-scroller platformer. Blast through this action-adventure hero platformer inspired by classic retro games, and stop an alien animals invasion by teaming up with Willy, our hero.

name: DreamCell: Lost in Nightmares
description: DreamCell: Lost in Nightmares is a randomly generated action with rogue-like elements. Conquer your nightmares and find a way out of your dark dreams in single player or co-op mode!

name: Alien Colosseum
description: Alien Colosseum is a fighter management simulator where you take the role of the Ludus manager, responsible for recruiting and training fighters to participate in the arena. When the fight begins, you then control the fighter and must win against a variety of enemies.

name: Terror Brain: Night Out
description: Terror Brain: Night Out is a Single-Player First-Person Action-Adventure Psychological Horror PC Game where you take on the role of university student Sarah Mitchell while she is trying to understand what happened to her after everything went dark during a night out at the local bar.

name: Dungeon 100
description: A diablo game that does not need to brush equipment and only focuses on skill sets.

name: Robot-X
description: A fast-paced platform shooter inspired by 90s classics. Follow Robot-X on a journey to protect the city from a new danger, fight bosses and jump over pits in this retro experience.

name: Carnage Cross
description: Start your engines in the vehicular combat game Carnage Cross, with seven playable drivers, nine levels, and an arsenal of weapons, specials and rogue-like abilities at your disposal in story or skirmish modes, your hi-octane skills will uncover secrets of the mysterious and destructive contest.

name: Starfighter Renegade
description: Fly into battle across multiple bite-size levels of exciting 3D aerial combat! Do you focus on taking out the alien fighters? Or rescue the stranded inhabitants before they're abducted? What about the deadly terraforming virus sweeping the surface below?

name: Antioch: Scarlet Bay
description:
Antioch is an online cooperative interactive fiction game.

Based on a story written by FibreTigre (the award winning author of Out There), you’ll play as one of two detectives working together to solve a intriguing crime. The adventure will bring you to the city of Antioch, a dark metropolis surrounded by moutains and sea.

We love text adventure games, and we wanted to approach them differently. We really believe that multiplayer will breath new life to this genre, giving more depth to your choices, because you’re playing with another human being.

Antioch could be summarized as a multiplayer gamebook, playable on all mobile devices (smartphones, tablets and Apple watch).

name: AAA Clock 2: Deluxe Edition
description: Enjoy this extravagant timepiece along with the new Jelly Clock skin.

name: A 20 Second Platformer
description: This game is made for the 20 Second Game Jam. You play as a small bear where you need to reach your goal in under 20 seconds or else you’ll fail. There are traps and bats flying around. You need to be careful, as you will die on the very first touch.

name: Interplayer
description: Pick up the tokens, write the source code, and repair the data that your doctor has deleted! Write source code that achieves the input and expected output pairs set for each stage. The code is written in tolerance, a dedicated language.

name: I am Feeling Things
description: This tiny bitsy game / visual novel tells the story of Lydia and Ophelia - two lesbians that experience their first date in person, after they have been talking online for a while. The scene takes place in a tiny café, on a rainy day.

name: Monster Hunter Rise: Title Update 3
description: Prepare to jump headfirst into the chaos with the brave denizens of Kamura and Elgado. Chaotic Gore Magala and two Risen Elder Dragons headline a host of additions coming in Sunbreak Free Title Update.

name: Guilty Gear: Strive - Additional Character 7: Sin Kiske
description: Adds Sin Kiske to the roster of playable characters

name: Fitness Circuit
description:
10 minutes a day, three days a week.

Fitness Circuit utilizes Super Circuit Training, a workout method that alternates aerobic and strength-building exercises to burn calories efficiently, increase endurance, and improve muscle strength in a short period of time. This method is designed to have a high training effect, so you won’t need to play every day. Complete a standard workout session in just 10 minutes a day, three days a week.

name: Team Fortaleza 2 Mobile
description: Join the battle of heroes with unique weapons and skills. Fight in the competitive battlefield or capture the flag, or you can fight the belligerent robots. Create rooms and play with friends or anyone. Tactics and skills will help you win, but don't forget to combine with teammates. Just fight!

name: Starlight: Defence Command
description: Starlight: Defence Command is a Tower Defence game designed for the PC that is tough and more in-depth than those gone before. With the ability to configure towers in billions of possible combinations, unlockable perks and fine tuning through target priorities, players are given powerful tools to complete the galaxy-spanning, story-driven campaign.

name: No T!me No Space
description: Capture the dark antimatter particles to unlock secret portals into different dimensions. A 3D FPS responsive ZEN shooter for Smartphone, Tablet, Laptop and PC. Let's play!

name: Blood Samurai: Night of Slaughter
description: Bloody Samurai is a dark style fighting platform and trap adventure game. The game requires strategic thinking and memory with special attention to avoiding traps. In the game, you will be in the role of a samurai. The evil demon hurt your family. In order to avenge you need to challenge many levels and finally fight the demon boss.

name: Simon: The Memory Game
description: Remember that memory game with colors that used to drive you crazy?

name: Planet Quiz: Learn & Discover - Trivia
description: Do you enjoy finding out interesting, bizarre or quirky facts? Whether you want something easy or more challenging, Trivia DLC will unlock many more hours of gameplay for you!

name: Planet Quiz: Learn & Discover - Forest Life
description: Lose yourself in the woods and be in harmony with nature in our new Forest Life DLC. Discover forests, grasslands, wetlands, amazing creatures as well as famous trees. Features: -Over 150 new log entries in Quizpedia: Forests, Grasslands, Wetlands, Famou…

name: Sausage Bundle: Till the last drop of ketchup
description: Survive a kitchen massacre solo or with friends! Run from a giant landmower or battle for domination in several locations such as kitchen sinks, sunny beach and mad scientist's lab.

name: Planet Quiz: Learn & Discover - Mystery & Myth
description: Are you ready to discover strange secrets of our world? Check this DLC researching mythological creatures and exploring mysterious places from ancient and modern times!

name: Arcade Archives: Galaxian
description:
"Galaxian" is a shooting game released by Namco in 1979.
You control a Galaxip and shoot aliens that approach you in eerie curves. Aliens during the assault double your score, and the flagship (Galboss) can be shot at in turn, starting with the escort (red alien), for a higher score.
Deftly dodge enemy aliens and destroy the large formation.

name: Hospice Vol. 1
description: Hospice is a kinetic visual novel game about pure brother without his little sister, a men with no hope, a place with no home.

name: SnekMP
description: Did you ever have a dispute with a friend? Finally there is a way to sort out whos Snek is bigger! However, in SnekMP bigger does not necessarily mean better! Having a huge C... khm... Snek definitely helps, but you will also need to be quite agile to win!

name: Light & Shadow
description: When a star falls in a nearby forest, it spurs Po onto a quest to find that light and bring it into their life. Light & Shadow is a shadow puppet platformer where you face your anxieties, push past depression, and seek moments of joy in a grey world. Finding your way isn't always easy, keep going!

name: Mystic Forest
description: Complete all achievements by killing forest monsters always with overwhelming power. Mystical Forest is a game for those who want to test their reflexes using four different types of weapons to slaughter monsters and bring peace to their village.

name: Sotidrokhima
description: Sotidrokhima is a semihistorical story-driven top-down hack-and-slash game with first-person elements.

name: Utopia
description: Utopia is a 2D top-down view barrage shooting RPG game played alone. The protagonist sets out on a journey to face various threats that befall the utopia world. Fight against a variety of incoming enemies and save the utopia world!

name: Virago: Herstory
description: Virago herstory is about a little girl called Willow who after running away from her home becomes a victim of stalking

name: Meat Madness
description: A short, 3D narrative-driven horror platformer. Journey deep into the meat tunnel and talk with survivors to uncover the grim truth.

name: Sword&Magic
description: Welcome to the magical continent of the Middle Ages full of magic and monsters! Everything you want will happen here! Just help the magicians touch the petrified seal and they will help you fight monsters!

name: Delivery Man
description: A small town food delivery man receives an order to deliver food to a strange house. When he arrived, he discovered that the house contained a terrifying secret that one who knew it would not be able to escape to tell others.

name: Swoon! Earth Escape
description: The planet is flooded with a mysterious green acid. Help Swoon and the rest of the crew escape the Earth. Collect all the mechanical parts of your spaceship and face the most daring bosses in this epic retro-style journey!

name: Floating Cloud God: Anniversary Edition
description: How many Pilgrims can you save? A vibrant, colourful and inventive 2D shoot-em-up where you can't be defeated, as long as you are loved!

name: Mischief Dungeon Life: Isekai Tensei shita Ore no Itazura Dungeon Life - Janice Edition
description:
“Mischief Dungeon Life" is an isekai fantasy novel game in which Renji is reborn in another world as a demon. He encounters various heroines while playing a big role in the fates of both the Demon Clan and the Human Tribe.
This bishojo game released in 2020 from the brand "Calcite" has been remade for the "CS Novel Club" platform so that it can be enjoyed by people of various ages around the world.

Janice Edition is a short version that includes a story focusing on "Janice," a dragoness who hates the occult.

name: Mischief Dungeon Life: Isekai Tensei shita Ore no Itazura Dungeon Life - Kuraara Edition
description:
“Mischief Dungeon Life" is an isekai fantasy novel game in which Renji is reborn in another world as a demon. He encounters various heroines while playing a big role in the fates of both the Demon Clan and the Human Tribe.
This bishojo game released in 2020 from the brand "Calcite" has been remade for the "CS Novel Club" platform so that it can be enjoyed by people of various ages around the world.

Clara. The "Clara version" is a short version that includes a story focusing on "Clara," the female heroine of the Elven tribe.

name: Mischief Dungeon Life: Isekai Tensei shita Ore no Itazura Dungeon Life - Asha Edition
description:
“Mischief Dungeon Life" is an isekai fantasy novel game in which Renji is reborn in another world as a demon. He encounters various heroines while playing a big role in the fates of both the Demon Clan and the Human Tribe.
This bishojo game released in 2020 from the brand "Calcite" has been remade for the "CS Novel Club" platform so that it can be enjoyed by people of various ages around the world.

Asha Edition is a short version that includes a story focusing on "Asha," the healing rabbit tribe.

name: Mischief Dungeon Life: Isekai Tensei shita Ore no Itazura Dungeon Life - Satsuki Edition
description: After an accident, Renji was reborn in another world as a "shapeshifter," a demon that can transform at will. He was reborn in a dungeon inhabited by demons… Using new demon powers, a thrilling and exciting life in the mischief dungeon begins…!

name: Arcade Paradise: Smoke 'em DLC
description: Aim. Fire. Reload. It’s time to test your sharpshooting skills against the clock in this supremely fun high scoring 2 player shooting range.

name: Fairy Biography 2: Confidante
description: Players can obtain game qualifications by using magic balls to attach naughty elves to the Elder Scrolls, unlocking and collecting different types of beautiful elves.

name: Zodiac Fantasy 2
description: The little sisters have an important date (maybe several!) Now they need your help to cross the obstacles, use jumping or climbing flexibly to reach the date, the girls will thank you for it!

name: Deep Dungeon
description: Deep Dungeon is a rogue-lite like you have never seen before. The vast underground caves are dangerous and full of vicious enemies. There's no failsave, no checkpoints. If you die, the run is over!

name: My Universe: My Baby Dragon
description: Raise baby dragons and teach them their elemental magic! Our little friends need you to help them spread their wings! From their hatching stage to the moment they’ll be able to fly on their own, take care of your baby Dragons and help them enter the marvelous Dragons’ school! Fly off for an enchanting adventure full of magic and become the best Dragonward of all time!

name: Unsolved Case
description:
Unsolved Case is the free prequel to the popular cooperative point-and-click puzzle game 'Cryptic Killer' series.
Dip your toes in and go back to where it all began as you team up in two as detective duo Old Dog and Ally, up against the Cryptic Killer. For the first time in the series, you'll encounter a labyrinth of puzzles and challenges laid by one of the most devious minds in the world. Solve puzzles, crack codes, and find a way out.
Have you got what it takes to crack the Unsolved Case of the Cryptic Killer?
Unsolved Case is a free game for two players to complete in 30-60 minutes. In this puzzle game, you'll get a taste of the mystery to come over the 5-part Cryptic Killer series.

name: New Joe & Mac: Caveman Ninja
description: We're back in the distant Past, when “Rock & Roll” was just about rocks and “Fast food”, a dinner that you couldn’t catch. 2 cave dudes named Joe & Mac live in a peaceful and cool village. Cool it was, until a bogus bunch of Neanderthal snatched all the village’s women!

name: Gaze Into Fate
description: A meditative and story-driven puzzle game, where you must discover answers to decisions, we all have to make. Can you make a change in a world of endless wars?

name: Mech Punk
description: Heartbreaking story of Pilot and W.A.I.F.U trapped in neverending BULLET HELL

name: Outer Space: War Gears
description: A single player space shooter that strikes a balance between simulation and fiction.

name: Kono Subarashii Sekai ni Shukufuku wo! Noroi no Ibutsu to Madoishi Boukensha-tachi
description: This new Konosuba game is going to be a sequel of the dungeon-crawling JRPG Kono Subarashii Sekai ni Shukufuku wo! Kibou no Meikyuu to Tsudoishi Boukenshatachi, originally released in 2019 for PS4 and PS Vita.

name: Black Rock Shooter: Fragment
description:
Black★Rock Shooter: Fragment is a mobile title based on the popular Japanese IP "Black★Rock Shooter" featuring a new setting and introducing new characters to the franchise.

The game will end its online services on the 1st of March, 2024.

name: Aliisha: The Oblivion of Twin Goddesses
description: Play solo or team up with a friend and guide twin sisters Aisha and Lisha through a mysterious temple in the beautiful fantasy adventure Aliisha: The Oblivion of Twin Goddesses. In the game, Aisha and Lisha will be controlled in their own distinctive way, so that the players will enjoy the playing experience exclusive to themselves. Both players not only have to brainstorm to solve puzzles, but they also need to move around to pass one level and another in the ruins.

name: The Indigo Parallel
description: The Indigo Parallel is an indie first-person exploration narrative. It takes place in the distant future through a journey of non-linear storytelling and multiple branching pathways to discover.

name: My Downtown
description: Help the Mayor breathe life into a sparkling new city! Play over 100 levels of match 3 bliss and build your own city!

name: Storyshift Asriel Battle!
description: Finally your little journey through Snowdin has come to an end. But there's still one obstacle on your way. This adorable fluffy monster means no harm to you, but it's your duty to finish his game with you. Give him what he wants!

name: Magic Princess
description: Magic Princess, the fantastically fun dress up game that allows you to create your very own girl and compete with friends to be the fashion and stylish royal in the land. With a huge array of clothing options and accessories to mix and match, all eyes will be on your fashion star!

name: Annum
description: Sin descripción

name: Meeting Myself
description:
It is a 3D first-person puzzle game, in which, the player must deal with, some, "diseases" by overcoming cryptic levels and grasping the meaning of them.
Meeting myself is a game that wants to reach out and raise awareness about certain moments in life and give a boost to those who are in a difficult time.

name: Bleach: Zanpakutou Senshi
description: The mod features a technical hack 'n' slash combat style, where you can fight in a team deathmatch as Ichigo or Grimmjow.

name: Gamehunt
description: A game about buying a game.

name: A Noite dos Patriotas
description: A Noite dos Patriotas is an indie game where you deal with patriots that want a federal intervention.

name: What's Updog
description: Our hero Pup wakes up one day overhearing their human talking about Updog. What is Updog? Is it food? Is it a place? Pup has to know! Set out on a journey around town and find out the answer to this very mysterious question. What's Updog? is a point and click adventure with 2D overworld exploration made for the original Game Boy!

name: Monster Hunter Rise: Extra DLC Pack
description: Enhance your Monster Hunter Rise experience! This is a special pack that contains a selection of popular DLC that has not been made available as a pack before!

name: Monster Hunter Rise: DLC Pack 8
description: The eighth Monster Hunter Rise DLC Pack includes new layered armor sets, gestures, makeup, face paint, hairstyles, voices, BGM and a sticker set.

name: Car Puzzle for Toddlers and Kids
description: This puzzle game is extremely easy to use and was tailored with great care to be played by children of all ages. It contains various difficulty-settings for entertaining a wide range of age-groups. Balloons and Bubbles can be popped at the end of each pu…

name: Two Jong Cell!!
description: Two Jong Cell!! is a mahjong simulation game,

name: Little Kong: Jungle Fun - Deluxe Edition
description: Kong got himself dirty while enjoying a mango. His mom tries to force him to bathe but he's got other plans... That is to run away as far as possible. This Bundle includes the Light-Blue DLC.

name: Kalzoon
description: Kalzoon is a 2D shooter where you are the most powerful creature from the planet Krim.

name: Crispy Puppy
description: Crispy Puppy is a horror game about a very old creepypasta.

name: Social Credit Simulator
description: Social Credit Simulator is a 2D game in which you control a person who assigns each person a social rating based on his actions and social status

name: Lament of the Yuppie
description: Horror at work, horror at home. There is no escape!

name: The Wood Story
description: Become one of the biggest luber kings in the world with this breathtaking story of young entrepreneur with small dream which comes through.

name: Draft Day Sports: Pro Basketball 2023
description: Draft Day Sports: Pro Basketball 2023 puts you in the role of general manager of your favorite basketball team. Every decision can be made by you from drafting, trading, signing free agents all the way to making each substitution to lead your team to championship glory and becoming a dynasty.

name: Teahouse of the Gods
description: The job offers a six-figure salary, pensions, and competitive benefits. Its description? You’ll run a teahouse on Mount Qingcheng in Sichuan, China. The job description didn’t mention reincarnation, gods, spirits, or the end of the universe.

name: Mad Geometry
description: You are what you collect.

name: Idle Shapes
description: Idle game with simple mechanics but truly addictive gameplay. Collect various shapes, buy upgrades and use prestige system to proceed as far as you can. Every upgrade matters, every prestige purchase is important. No endless goals and infinite boring gameplay. Just pure fun and adequate goals.

name: Aviator: Air Combat
description: Plunge into the world of sky battles. Pursue an enemy bomber while dodging oncoming missiles. Get your adrenaline pumping and be rewarded with a bonus level.

name: Blobek
description: Speed ACTION! Excellent soundtrack! Fast JUMP! Disaster! RAMPAGE! ENERGY!

name: 5 Days
description: Five days is a fully open world, no limits time travel puzzle adventure. This game isn't just a time loop of the same day on repeat, this game lets you travel between five different days. Use your knowledge of the future and ability to travel to the past to assassinate a heavily defended king.

name: The Shadow Over Route 80
description: Alone at night, working at a petrol station deep in the American wheat belt. Something feels off... are you sure you're alone? A short 10-15 minute horror game with multiple endings.

name: Siren Head: The Horror Experience
description:
While working the late shift at the Police Department, you receive a report about some teenagers that went missing in Windermere Woods. Old folk tales mention these woods, and of a monster that is said to lurk there, but those are just stories... right?

It is your job to find these teens, but you did not imagine the horrors you would face.
The old folks tale states that the mythical monster surrounds its habitat with siren noises of all kinds, luring unsuspecting victims.

name: Cleopatra Fortune: S-Tribute
description: Surround falling stones and treasures to fill up and wipe out lines! Score points with "all clears" and "chains." Cleopatra Fortune, a puzzle game set in Egypt, has been revived with new modes that make it easier to play. Two players can face off in versus mode.

name: Sands of Slumber: The RPG
description: A 2D Old-school RPG based on the Dungeons and Dragons Custom World Campaign of the same name. Players play as the 4 main heroes of the story as they adventure around Tanaviak, leveling up, gaining new skills and exploring the land.

name: Oylinder
description: A 3D platformer like you've never seen before, you must climb a mountain, by controlling a ball with six legs, a key for each leg, jump, roll and fall until you have mastered it. If you seek a challenge, this is it.

name: Funeral
description: Funeral is a first-person horror game that creates a terrifying atmosphere and powerful tension. Solve mild puzzles, explore different worlds, and escape from the demon's trap.

name: Sinner 97
description: Sinner 97 is a first person PSX VHS psychological horror set in 1997, within the confines of a shadowy religious cult. Remain hidden and overcome problems in order to escape the Father's clutches.

name: EvoluShip
description: In this game with elements of roguelike, RPG and Bullet Hell, you control a ship with the power to absorb enemies and improve itself, but even then it won't be easy, because you'll face the hordes of enemies with a good variety of weapons that come randomly as you pass level.

name: Godbeast Mk.II
description: The Wolf howls in the moonlight! Scarlet blood will glisten on the dark city streets in this stylish and atmospheric action game.

name: James Peris 2: The Fountain of Eternal Drunkenness
description: The long awaited new adventure by James Peris, after No License, No Control, Much more of everything! A point-and-click adventure with adult humor and a touch of hooliganism. Totally open gameplay and non-linear puzzles.

name: Dysterra
description: Dysterra is a large-scale multiplayer sci-fi survival shooter game available on Steam that embodies deep crafting systems such as construction and production, while offering players exciting conflicts and environmental calamities within the visual power of the Unreal Engine 4. It is developed by Reality MagiQ and published by Kakao Games.

name: Starway Ateez
description: Starway Ateez is an Android puzzle game developed by Snowballs Inc. It's a simple and friendly game that everyone can enjoy. The game features match-three puzzles with Ateez . Players need to put three same blocks together to pop them. Matching four or more same blocks will create special blocks that can help clear the board faster.

name: Foxo's Fun Schoolhouse
description: Foxo's Fun Schoolhouse is an educational fun game where you have to find comics for a friend! Foxo, the main teacher will help you with your adventure. It won't be an easy though!

name: The Monastery of Mount Cinburron
description: Command noticed an anomaly in their Slipgate network. After sending a few scouting parties into the anomaly, none of which have returned, they are starting to fear the worst. They sent you in to investigate the anomaly and report your findings upon your return.

name: Valis
description:
Valis a 32 level singleplayer megawad for DOOM 2.
All maps were designed with pistol start in mind, but continuous play works as well.
Freelook is not required, but recommended. Turn off infinitely tall monsters. Difficulties settings are available.

name: Refidenptio
description: A Boomer-Shooter with epileptic 1-bit pixel art. Immerse yourself in an enigmatic story destroying all enemies in front of you with a unique combat mechanic. Face depression head on, your enemies are just things created by your mind.

name: Abscission
description:
Abscission is a dark and moody 32-map vanilla megawad with an original ambient/noise soundtrack composed by me.
Each map loosely follows the style of the original iwad levels, but with distinct and new layouts rather than being a remake. Visuals are classic since I stuck to stock textures other than custom skies.
The difficulty is slightly above average - expect difficult fights that don't become tedious or frustrating.

name: Fall Guys: Otter Delights Pack
description: They might not be great butlers, but who cares when they're this cute?

name: Nightmares Before Disney
description: In a land where all your dreams come true, does the same apply to nightmares?

name: CargoRun
description: Cargo Run is a fun platformer 3d Third Person game where you have to pass through different obstacles to get to your goal.

name: Warm Snow: The Ash of Nightmare
description: The Ash of Nightmare DLC will introduce a new mechanic that will be at the core of the DLC, the Nightmare system, as well as five new bosses, six true and false endings, 30+ new Nightmare abilities, a hundred combos, and several new NPC skins!

name: Sunlit's Star Fox Minihack
description: A mini Star Fox hack with 1 route and 6 levels.

name: Fallen London: Salon Scandal!
description: This is a DLC for the game Fallen London. It is part of the Exceptional Stories, a monthly release of new stories that are available for subscribers (Exceptional Friends) for free, and available for purchase afterwards.

name: Little Mouse's Encyclopedia: Ultimate Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Bombing Wonderful
description: Play as Momoko, the super heroine Wonderful Pink, and defeat the aliens in this 18+ shoot-em-up.

name: Starcatcher
description: Collect stars in outer space

name: Yes, My Demon Queen!
description:
Finally, your favorite strategy game is about to make its demon race playable! You’ve always wanted to fight on the villains’ side, but that dream soon becomes your new reality when an altercation leaves your life flashing before your eyes. Suddenly, you find yourself in a fantasy world surrounded by demons and humans in the middle of a war!

Well, all you need to do is survive, right? That’s easier said than done when you’re serving under the sadistic demon queen. She doesn’t care who she has to step on to get her way, and if she finds out you aren’t really her general, who knows what she’ll do to you!

name: Sea of Thieves: Season 8
description: Sin descripción

name: Myara Story 1: Hurricane of the Ancient One
description: A vertical scrolling danmaku-style somewhat story-heavy game.

name: Balls of Fame Holiday Bundle
description: The Balls of Fame Holiday Bundle features 5 games developed by FarSight Studios!

name: Century: Age of Ashes - Mercenary Edition
description: The Mercenary Edition includes the full game Century: Age of Ashes and extra rewards.

name: Mini Miners
description: Mini miners is a resource management strategy game mixed with clicker mechanics. The aim is to allow players to collect as many resources in the most effective way possible. Users can enjoy a rich experience of farming to earn real rewards. In the game, you will manage a growing team of little men who will happily work the mines for you. Your job is to effectively distribute the resources attained, to earn bigger and greater rewards. Check out our website for information: https://miniminersgame.com/

name: Al Crepuscolo VR
description: A relaxing experience in virtual reality where you use your kayak to travel through a magical corner of wildlife to locate the venue of a magical music festival.

name: Dead by Daylight: Forged in Fog Chapter
description: Dead by Daylight's Forged In Fog Chapter features a new Killer - The Knight - and a new Survivor, Vittorio Toscano. Purchasing this add-on unlocks an exclusive Cosmetic for Vittorio: Handsome Riding Jacket.

name: Just Dance 2023 Edition: Ultimate Edition
description: Welcome to a new era of dance with Just Dance 2023 Edition! For the first time ever, dance to BTS with "Dynamite" and other top chart hits! Now with new online multiplayer, personalization, 3D immersive worlds, and new songs and modes year-round.

name: Just Dance 2023 Edition: Deluxe Edition
description: Welcome to a new era of dance with Just Dance 2023 Edition! For the first time ever, dance to BTS with "Dynamite" and other top chart hits! Now with new online multiplayer, personalization, 3D immersive worlds, and new songs and modes year-round.

name: Fall Guys: Season 3 - Sunken Secrets
description:
Deep breath, Beans - we’re heading underwater. Sunken Secrets await in Fall Guys: Season 3!

This season, explore a lost city under the sea! These crumbling courses are in need of repair, so get ready to dodge the dangers of the deep, including wonky obstacles and the tentacles of a mighty kraken! The city's former inhabitants also built colossal slime slides, so take a leap for a quick but perilous slip to the finish line!

name: Prison Architect: Future Tech Pack
description: Welcome Wardens! Only the world's most ruthless Warden can contain the world's most ruthless inmates. Design and develop your personalized penitentiary in Prison Architect.

name: Pub Fascination
description: The fascination of the pub is to meet a beautiful girl and start a casual game in a slightly drunk state. . .

name: Jacob's Quest
description: Become a Legend in Jacob's Quest, a JRPG that anyone can pick up and play. Save the four crystals of the world and prevent a vile plot from unfolding. With epic battles and world progression, Jacob's Quest is the RPG of choice.

name: Festival Tycoon: Water for All!
description: Build a brand new charity booth for your festival attendees! All profits from this DLC go to Viva Con Agua, a charity working to provide clean drinking water around the world.

name: The Winter Tower
description: Will Ekaterina be able to safely complete her coming-of-age ceremony and emerge as the rightful successor to the House?

name: Sexy Elf
description: Move all parts to form the complete image.

name: Shy Girl
description: Move all parts to form the complete image.

name: Dice Game
description: Dice Game is a 2D game in which you have to fight in a deadly dice game.

name: My Little Miniatures
description: My Little Miniatures is a strategy game combining entertaining auto-battler gameplay with competitive tactics. Fighting in an battle, ration your golds and items sensibly, ponder on the features of various formations, activate powerful synergies with unique builds!

name: Hentai Beauty
description: Move all parts to form the complete image.

name: Hentai BunnyGirl
description: Hentai BunnyGirl is a relaxing puzzle game. With the theme of bunny girl and 24 unique sexy girls Enjoy sexy girls pictures and relaxing music to complete the puzzle.

name: Draw and Color: Kawaii - Ultimate Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Ping Pong Peg
description: Ping Pong Peg is an intense arcade style game full of RPG elements and strategy. As the player, you control the top and bottom paddles trying to hit all of the pegs in each level by keeping the ball in play with the bumpers. Clearing the levels allows you to upgrade the bumpers, balls, and abilities to improve your odds of beating the levels and defeating the bosses. Do you have what it takes to master the pegs?

name: Hunting Life VR: Dove Season
description: Bag your limit in a one-of-a-kind VR experience! Customize your hunt to have a realistic hunt for fast, spooky birds or an action packed day of shooting!

name: The Enemy Approached the Walls
description: "The Enemy Approached The Walls"is a war strategy game. You will play a commander, choose different card combinations to improve the combat effectiveness of the army, recruit and deploy soldiers in real time according to the battlefield situation, and finally repel the enemy.

name: Kind Heart Defenders
description: Kind Heart Defenders is an experience that brings the best of Space Shooter with the best of Tower Defense. Have fun building towers, trying different ships, laughing at the characters' jokes, and battling through intergalactic scenarios and gigantic bosses.

name: Eon Fighter
description: Eon fighters, key to our survival, collect resources to sustain the war against different invading civilizations. Join this huge task, upgrade your ship and weapons to survive waves of increasingly difficult enemies!

name: Just Dance 2023 Edition: Special Edition
description: Welcome to a new era of dance with Just Dance 2023 edition! Now with online multiplayer, personalization, 3D immersive worlds and new songs and modes year-round, you can experience a never- ending dance party all year long!

name: Just Dance 2023 Edition
description: Welcome to a new era of dance with Just Dance 2023 edition! Now with online multiplayer, personalization, 3D immersive worlds and new songs and modes year-round, you can experience a never- ending dance party all year long!

name: Gungrave G.O.R.E: Day One Edition
description:
Gungrave G.O.R.E is a stylish third-person action shooter by South-Korean Studio IGGYMOB in which you take on the role of Grave, a gunslinger of resurrection and badass anti-hero of your dreams, mowing down tons of enemies in a gory ballet of bullets.

In the near future, the Seed, a dangerous alien drug re-surfaces and spreads all over the world. You are “Grave” a former Mafia hitman, killed, revived and turned into a one-man army, a Gunslinger of Resurrection devoid of emotions but obsessed with eradicating the Seed and protecting your adopted daughter, Mika.

Prepare for an epic quest across South-East Asia and exact your vengeance.

Day One Edition content:
- Death Ronin Grave
- O.D. Grave

name: Mad Adventures
description: Work together or betray each other! Unlock lobby-wide upgrades. Survive a 4-day expedition to reach the final boss. A Multiplayer 3D Platformer with a sprinkle of Roguelike and Battle Royale!

name: Ship of Fools
description: Ship of Fools is a seafaring cooperative roguelite. Set sail, man the cannons and battle sea monsters through the tempestuous seas of the Archipelago. Are you fool enough to stop the Aquapocalypse?

name: RXC
description: Battle the world in reckless races as you bash, slide, and jump your way to the checkered flag. This isn't just another top-down arcade racing game. RXC is a physics heavy racing game with a traction and handling model that challenges even die-hard sim racers while still being fun for newcomers.

name: Beers and Boomerangs
description: A VR game where you throw boomerangs at kangaroos that are trying to steal your beer! Cook and bring drinks to your mates, but don't forget to defend your BBQ from those pesky kangaroos!

name: GrandMa Badass
description:
Grandma Badass is a 2D cartoon point and click adventure game.

This point and click video game immerses you in the shoes of GrandMa, an old woman who will work to find her black cat Marius, missing and probably kidnapped.

name: Evil West
description:
A dark menace consumes the Old West. In solo or coop, fight with style in visceral, explosive combat against bloodthirsty monstrosities. Eradicate the vampiric hordes with your lightning-fueled gauntlet and become a Wild West Superhero.

In visceral, explosive combat, unleash hell with your firearms, lightning-fueled gauntlet and gadgets. Kill bloodthirsty monstrosities in style as a lone hunter or in co-op with a friend. Explore and fight in a narrative-driven campaign while upgrading your weapons and hunting tools. Unlock new perks to evolve your monster-slaying mastery, crafting your own playstyle to defeat the supernatural hordes.

name: Mirages of Winter
description: Embark on a poetic journey through a beautiful ink-painted island in Mirages of Winter. Explore wonderful ink-painted sceneries and solve soothing puzzles.

name: Grapple Whip
description: You are a cowboy without legs and uses his grapple whip to move around!

name: Gungrave G.O.R.E
description:
Gungrave G.O.R.E. is being developed for Playstation 4 and is planned to have a much larger scale than previous games. It is the second game in the Gungrave reboot and will cover new story content for the game series.
The game is set to take place after Gungrave VR which is a remake of the PS2 Gungrave game that also covers the story of Gungrave Overdose to some extent.

name: Rawbots
description: A universe where you can play with amazing robots that are designed, built and even programmed by you. Everything is a robot, doors, roads, walls, bridges, safes, traps, turrets, surveillance systems, etc. Build forts, towers and architect impressive structures to protect your planets and resources. You may play solo or with friends to infiltrate, conquer planets and gather resources.

name: 2Kaizo 2Learn
description: Sin descripción

name: Mini Cup
description: In this game, you’ll face off against a goalkeeper from the rival country of each match. Choose the nation you support and try to score as many penalties as possible, with the goalkeeper increasing in speed each time you score.

name: 200 Line Massacre: The Slaughtering
description: 200 Line Massacre: The Slaughtering is a megawad (full 32 maps + 4 bonus) by @Arsinikk and @NinjaDelphox with the goal of making Vanilla slaughter-like maps under 200 lines. It is the sequel to 100 Line Massacre and also features additional mapping by @scwiba and @finnks13.

name: Pickle-Pocalypse
description: PICKLE-POCALYPSE is a goofy 2D arcade shooter game about heroic cucumbers fighting for survival in a world of zombified pickles. Featuring a varied lineup of 5 weapons and frantic gameplay for 1-4 players. How long will you survive in the PICKLE-POCALYPSE?

name: Walk Around this Place
description: Sin descripción

name: Taming the Heart of a Beast
description: Wild beasts and famine have ravaged your village since birth. To help the village, the elders enlist you to 'excavate' a jeweled heirloom from a powerful baron. Days later, the angry baron makes his appearance, demanding the stolen artifact back.

name: Castlevania: Contra Mode
description: Castlevania: Contra Mode is a Contra themed rom hack for Castlevania: Order of Ecclesia. Just like Contra, the game difficulty increases the more you progress to another level.

name: Rescue Yoshi!
description: Luigi must save Yoshi from Bowser in 4 new worlds.

name: Outdoor Adventures With Marisa Kirisame: Fishing
description: Marisa invites you for a fun little activity with her! It's none other than fishing! Capture fish in a cute little mini game and enjoy the dialogue with Marisa in this campy, feel-good expansion to the game!

name: Skylore
description: Sin descripción

name: Qual a Capa?
description:
Qual a Capa? is an interactive game for streamers that can be played with the audience through Twitch chat.
Players need to guess the blurred book cover displayed on the screen before the time ends up.

name: TheHunter: Call of the Wild - Essentials DLC Bundle
description: The Essentials DLC Bundle has everything a Hunter needs to get started. Take a spin in the ATV, head out on a hike with your faithful Bloodhound and brand-new rifle, and lay out your trophies for all to see at the Saseka Safari Trophy Lodge.

name: TheHunter: Call of the Wild - Greenhorn Bundle
description: The Greenhorn Bundle is perfect for Hunters who are looking for a head-start on the hunting trail. Explore the reserves of theHunter: Call of the Wild in an ATV, get to know your faithful Bloodhound, and explore the variety of gear available.

name: TheHunter: Call of the Wild - Master Hunter Bundle
description: You've outgrown your home territory - now the world's your oyster! With the Master Hunter Bundle you're ready for anything! From the frozen wilds of Medved-Taiga National Park to the plains of Vurhonga Savannah, your gear will carry you through.

name: TheHunter: Call of the Wild - Seasoned Hunter Bundle
description: Ready to Roam? Let's go! With a wide array of weapons at your disposal, high-tech gear and your trusty hound at your side, the Seasoned Hunter Bundle has everything you need to survive and thrive in the wider world of theHunter: Call of the Wild.

name: MeMoMi
description: A 2D psychological adventure game set in a body-like mystery world. Player's mission is to find a blue bird, a legendary feather that can save this body.

name: Morendo
description: Let Morendo pull you into a dark vortex of lies, betrayal, lust and gluttony. Join a concert guitarist on his journey into the abyss.

name: GasZilla
description: A huge lizard, like Godzilla, has awakened after a thousand-year sleep and is going to destroy everything in its path. Help bring humanity back to the stone age as soon as possible.

name: SGS Okinawa
description: A standalone epic rendering of the 1945 bloody fighting on Okinawa, the last great battle of the Pacific War. The game is part of the Pacific D-Day collection. Both sides are playable, each with their own challenge.

name: The Shelter of Patient
description: This game is a 3D based simulation horror game and has a high graphic level. Help the protagonist, a journalist, explore a mysterious mansion in the mountains. Of course you shouldn't die.

name: Dwarfer
description: Dwarfer - This is a logic puzzle where you have to manage a squad of dwarves in search of gold. help the dwarves get out of the dungeon alive.

name: Stolen Dolls
description: Stolen Dolls is a 2D platform game in which the girl with the gun must collect her toy dolls.

name: Bot World
description: Bot World is a zelda-like game about exploring locations, upgrading your weapons and destroying scary bosses.

name: Power Driver
description: Power Driver is an arcade racing game where you will have to not only try to overtake your opponent, but also literally fight for your life on the race track.

name: My Soul Forever
description: My Soul Forever is a 2D puzzle game about a knight who could control his ghost spirit.

name: Portable Ops
description: Play as a mercenary for hire in Solo, Co-op, or 12-v-12 matches online. Enter battle with your team, cover for each other, and achieve your objectives to get paid. No super soldiers just real professionals. Players' abilities are modeled on real-life, professional soldiers.

name: Ants of Duty
description: Ants of Duty is a strategy game about managing a small colony of ants that find themselves in an unknown territory.

name: Once in a Blue Moon
description: Welcome to Once in a Blue Moon (OIABM), a beautifully hand-crafted experience that is literally out of this world. Set in a cosmic galaxy, you will have the chance to take a walk through an immersive forest with shafts of glorious light generated by the large Blue Moon in orbit.

name: Lab Inspect
description: You play as an inspector tasked with checking one of the Tepas labs. Strange things have been happening in the lab for a long time. It's time to check what's wrong with him.

name: Saraba Gekiyaki: Encore
description: Sin descripción

name: Blood Exile
description: Blood Exile is an arcade top down shooter with elements of procedural generation. Immerse yourself in the ancient world of magic, protecting it from the invasion of the undead.

name: Drag and Drop
description: Remember how you dragged the little man into google maps? Try something like this in the game Drag and Drop!

name: Cult of the Mask
description: Incomprehensible guys decided to organize a cult dedicated to an incomprehensible mask, you need to stop this business! Will you?

name: Love Liar
description: If I could get a revenge on my ex-boyfriend, I would sell my soul to the devil!

name: Follow the Crown
description: Join a thrilling adventure with an Ambassador of the United States & a Hungarian Crown Guard to keep the Hungarian Holy Crown from Nazis and return it to Hungary during the Cold War. You can't trust anyone on this journey; only your wits.

name: VTuber Connect
description: VTuber Connect is a love letter to VTubers as a medium. One that hides nothing, but embraces everything. Whether you’re a VTuber or a viewer, we all form connections in our own way. How will you connect?

name: Keep of the Witch
description: An Anime inspired 3D adventure game were you ascend a castle with puzzling and platforming, leading to Boss fights at the end of each floor. You are to save the princess with 4 separate characters, 8* different endings, and a maid that supports you along the way.

name: Police Transporter Simulator
description: Now it's all up to you how quiet the city will be...

name: Death in the Night
description: A puzzle platformer with deadly dangers.

name: Please Be Happy
